name: Memories Remain (Mloren)
description:
Memories Remain was created for Global Game Jam 2022, the theme was Duality.

You play as a small goblin child wandering a dead world, collecting your lost memories to restore it. The world is haunted by spectres which will try to destroy you if you venture into their world.

We spent an extra couple of days polishing this game after the game jam ended, the original can still be played on the GGJ site.

Game can also be played in a browser (https://mloren.net/MemoriesRemain/) although I recommend downloading it from the link below for the full experience.

  • Design: Laura Wilkinson & Richard Stern
  • Programming: Richard Stern
  • Art: Laura WIlkinson
  • Music: Aidan Dissonance
  • Sound Effects: Aidan Dissonance & abbysinthe
